title: Hello... I guess b5 looking for a tad of help?
body:
I made this request earlier on the NA server boards accidentally, I won't write what I wrote there. Hello, I'm a b5 Morgana support main, and I've lately been having a tonne of trouble in ranked. Now, when I say I main support, it's because I won my first 13 ranked games with her, but that quickly went downhill. Anyway enough about that, I hit bronze 2 earlier in the year, and from then on my winning turned to losing. I'm not sure what happened, whether it was me or my teams (My lolsumo says it's not me, but I'm not a pessimist and understand that I make mistakes). My MMR is bronze 3, and I'd like someone to help me in ranked. If not, I'm sorry for wasting your time and hope you have a good day and a slumber filled night.

Summary - I'm b5, looking for assistance in achieving a higher rank with a duo partner. I've been playing since 2012-2013 (I forgot which)

Alright... that's all! Thank you for listening.

replies.body:
Im an adc main at B3 i peaked at B1 earlier this year, i can play a couple of games with you, probably wont hit silver before wednesday tho

I looked at your match history, you need to get {{item:3341}} when you buy sightstone and {{item:3364}} when you hit level 9, also pinks wards BRAH.

add me Buttsubushi if you wanna play
Yeah, I often forget to or just keep the {{item:3340}} for an extra two wards incase the others are destroyed.
Well its not about how many wards you place its the positioning over them. Quality over quantity

nah man big mistake, advise for supports (im a sup main)  as Buttsubushi mentioned you NEED red trinket, it is essential in lane for ward control and map dominance,

I had a look at your recent stats, With Braum try building Mountain and Sighstone separate, Mountain provides shield, Plus passive gives  you and your ADC health and gold. Sighstone gives you health so you get pretty much more health when bought separately.

Also some advice for Bronze, try another role apart from sup, I played ADC last season from bronze 5 to Silver II playing Vayne

Support is good and all and requires alot of thinking despite what people say, From what i can tell dude it may not be role that suits you unless you keep practising, youll be fine if you keep it up with morgana build tanky AP , Braum just build full tank your passive pretty much peels enough for the ADC.

I agree with Gordon. Play a different role if you want to climb. Supporting bronze is so frustrating, especially when you can't get messages through to them. Like what objectives to prioritise at certain times. Usually the team that gets ahead (takes first few towers) wins because the game snowballs out of control (bronze have no idea how to turtle).

I disagree
I managed to play braum and karma supp on my smurf 
Getting me from b4 to s5
U can hyper carry with janna. braum and karma if u know how to poke, ward and shot call with the adc and learning their play style 
Whilst being diverse in your build and actions

Perhaps if you are duo yes. Otherwise bronze/silver supporting is random as to how you climb and how you don't climb. Depends on if you get a lucky run or not. And if your team listens (most of the time they don't).

Yeah man pretty much like at bronze people with limited understanding play adc, mid and that but they dunno how to play as a team, So if you're full trying your hardest to support an ADC who cant do shit all with 40 CS at 20mins you have no chance at winning. 

You wanna Try different roles and keep trying to Carry yourself. Like deadset if you can carry yourself, you essentially carry the team just as long as everyone covers you you're all tops, 

PS Play champions who can actually carry late game
